title: Company.of.Heroes.2.Master.Collection.REPACK-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Company.of.Heroes.2.            
                            Master.Collection.REPACK-KaOs ]-
                                                            
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                      
                                                            
Release/Size:-------------[ 8.66GB ]-                       
                                                            
Release/Date:-------------[ 31-08-16 ]-                     
                                                            
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                     
                                                            
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Plaza ]-                        
                                                            
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Foreign Stuff ]-                
                                                            
Movie/Recode:-------------[ Reduced @ Original Rez ]-       
                                                            
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Rebuild ]-                      
                                                            
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Untouched ]-                    
                                                            
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ 39.27GB ]-                      
                                                            
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 20.3GB ]-                       
                                                            
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ Yes ]-                          



Step-1:-------[ Unrar Using Latest Winrar Or Equivilant ]-     
                                                               
Step-2:-------[ Click Install.exe                              
                Select Install Location And Wait For The       
                Game Data To Be Extracted/Rebuilt ]-           
                                                               
Step-3:-------[ Use The Created Desktop Or Startmenu           
                Shortcut To Play ]-                            
                                                               
                                                               
Estimated Install Time:- 40 Mins HDD To SSD         8 Cores [*]
                                                    4 Cores [ ]
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
REPACK Notes:                                                  
                                                               
Redone Using Plasas Upto Date Version.                         
                                                               
Bigger Than Our Previous Release Due To Keeping The Original   
Movie Resolution Of 720p.                                      
                                                               
Skirmish Is Now Fully Functional. Missing Dlcs Included.       
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
Release Notes:                                                 
                                                               
Game is updated to the latest version (4.0.0.21400).           
                                                               
In-game items are unlocked (commanders, intel bulletins, skins,
decals, faceplates, victory strike, decals) : accessable by    
clicking the case button in the upper right corner. Also,      
skirmish is fully working in this release, unlike in the       
previous ones.                                                 
                                                               
Previously unreleased DLC The British Forces is included and   
fully working in skirmish mode.                                
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
Install Notes:                                                 
                                                               
Depending On The Release One Or More Command Windows May Open  
They Must Be Allowed To Finish And Should Not Be Closed Until  
Otherwise Prompted.                                            
                                                               
We Recommend Installing To A Short Path As Games With Deep     
Directory Structures Can Cause Missing Files.                  
                                                               
Do Not Install To A Path With Invalid Characters Or The Game   
Will Fail To Rebuild, Paths Like "Program Files (x86)"         
Contain Brackets What Will Cause Issues With Some Games.       
If In Doubt Use The Default Install Folder, The Game Can       
Then Be Moved To A Prefered Location When Install/Rebuild Is   
Complete
